CutSceneText.Text: Good news. Sadena said that she would be here,
and Agamo and Selesti promised to help, too.
I am just so grateful that she didn't refuse the request!
It's the moment I've been waiting for!
Oh, Sadena! You are the hope that gives me strength...
A life without you is like a scabbard without a sword, or a bow without a string.
What a horrible poem, and you're dressed...like a clown!
Don't ever speak to me again--ever!
